attributes.action: Stop Killing and Violence against Somali Community in South Africa
attributes.additional_details:
Somali community was hit by a series of attacks in South Africa over the last week, The Somali man, 25-year-old Abdi Nasir Mahmoud Good, was stoned to death on May 30 by a mob. Five other Somalis have been injured and about 40 shops have been looted in the four provinces across the country.

I therefore ask you to:
Make ending the violence against Somali People in South Africa one of your top priorities.
1.Exert Pressure on the South Africa Government to respond to the request of the Human right Activist by convening a national conference and public awareness.
2.Declare the extremist militia to stop the violence and the terrorism.
4.Increase humanitarian support to person(s)/families traumatized by terror.

Thank you for your leadership on this urgent matter.
